Survivor Eligibility for DEA Purposes Under 38 U.S.C. 1318
When Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) is awarded to a surviving spouse or child under
38 U.S.C. 1318
, presume permanence of disability,
unless
theÂ Veterans Benefits Administration has specific evidence to the contrary, and award entitlement to DEA.
Do
not
develop for service connection (SC) of the cause of death in these cases.
